```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
resolution <- "HH"

sites <- c("CA-NS1", "CA-NS2", "CA-NS3", "CA-NS4", "CA-NS5", "CA-NS6", "CA-NS7")

CA_NS1_data <- tibble(read.csv(str_c("Data/",sites[1],"/", resolution,".csv")))

CA_NS2_data <- tibble(read.csv(str_c("Data/",sites[2],"/", resolution,".csv")))

CA_NS3_data <- tibble(read.csv(str_c("Data/",sites[3],"/", resolution,".csv")))

CA_NS4_data <- tibble(read.csv(str_c("Data/",sites[4],"/", resolution,".csv")))

CA_NS5_data <- tibble(read.csv(str_c("Data/",sites[5],"/", resolution,".csv")))

CA_NS6_data <- tibble(read.csv(str_c("Data/",sites[6],"/", resolution,".csv")))

CA_NS7_data <- tibble(read.csv(str_c("Data/",sites[7],"/", resolution,".csv")))


CA_NS1_data |> mutate("TIMESTAMP" = ymd_hm(TIMESTAMP_START))
```
